name: Seared Sea Scallops
author: CHRISADAMS
summary: Seared on the outside with a light crust and tender on the inside. You may vary the amounts of all seasonings to suit your taste.
directions: In a large bowl, mix together flour, salt, oregano, thyme and lemon pepper
Roll scallops in flour mixture until lightly coated on all sides
Heat olive oil in a skillet or frying pan over high heat
Add 4 scallops to the pan and sear on all sides (about 2 minutes for each side)
After turning scallops, add 1 tablespoon parsley and 1 teaspoon lemon juice
Remove scallops from pan and place on a plate in the oven to keep warm until ready to serve
Repeat until remaining scallops are cooked, tossing each batch with parsley and lemon juice
